trans-unit.source: Represents an entity container in a conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: 代表概念模型中的實體容器。

trans-unit.source: An EntityContainer is a logical grouping of entity sets and association sets.
trans-unit.target: EntityContainer 為實體集合和關聯集的邏輯群組。

trans-unit.source: On the conceptual level, the EntityContainer class represents a container that will be mapped to a database object in the storage metadata schema.
trans-unit.target: 在概念層級而 EntityContainer 類別會表示將會對應到儲存中繼資料結構描述中的資料庫物件的容器。

trans-unit.source: In the storage level, the EntityContainer class represents a description of the table and/or key relationships that persist data for applications built on the model.
trans-unit.target: 在儲存層級中，EntityContainer 類別會代表資料表和/或保存在模型上建置的應用程式資料的索引鍵關聯性的描述。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the entity containers in a conceptual model, see [Entity Containers (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9afa762f-59b8-4a70-b76d-89d90760144c).
trans-unit.target: 如需概念模型中實體容器的詳細資訊，請參閱[實體容器 (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9afa762f-59b8-4a70-b76d-89d90760144c)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of entity sets and association sets that this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> includes.
trans-unit.target: 取得的實體集合和關聯集合的清單這<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>包含。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601> object that contains a list of entity sets and association sets that this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref> includes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601>物件，其中包含一份實體集合和關聯集合的這<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>包含。

trans-unit.source: Gets the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個內建型別種類<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"></xref> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"> </xref>物件，表示這個內建型別種類<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a collection of <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmFunction"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 指定的集合<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmFunction"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Each function contains the details of a stored procedure that exists in the database or equivalent `CommandText` that is mapped to an entity and its properties.
trans-unit.target: 每個函式包含存在於資料庫或同等權限的預存程序的詳細資料`CommandText`，對應至實體和其屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601> that contains <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmFunction"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.ReadOnlyMetadataCollection%601>包含<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmFunction"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the entity set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref>物件使用指定的實體集名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity set that is searched for.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的實體集名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>執行不區分大小寫的搜尋否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object that represents the entity set that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"> </xref>物件，代表具有指定的名稱的實體集。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the relationship set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref>所使用的關聯性集合的指定的名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the relationship set that is searched for.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之關聯性也就是集合的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>執行不區分大小寫的搜尋否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object that represents the relationship set that has the specified name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"> </xref>物件，代表具有指定的名稱的關聯性集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個名稱<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個名稱<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The name of this <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntityContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the entity set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref>物件使用指定的實體集名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the entity set that is searched for.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋的實體集名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>執行不區分大小寫的搜尋否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EntitySet"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: If there is no entity set, this output parameter contains null.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何實體集，這個輸出參數會包含 null。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is an entity set that matches the search criteria; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果沒有符合搜尋準則，實體集否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object by using the specified name for the relationship set.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref>所使用的關聯性集合的指定的名稱的物件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the relationship set that is searched for.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋之關聯性也就是集合的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform the case-insensitive search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>執行不區分大小寫的搜尋否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含<xref href="System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is a relationship set that matches the search criteria; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果沒有符合搜尋準則，關聯性集合否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
